title: Freelance Full-Stack Web Site Developer | dilyan.net
description: Freelance Full-Stack Web Site Developer from Bulgaria specialized in Angular, TypeScript, Node.JS, PHP. I provide services such as website development, application development, API integration and development and database design.
author: Dilyan Lyubomirov
im_dilyan: I'm Dilyan, a full-stack web developer, based in Sofia, Bulgaria
im_dilyan_info: with over 10 years of experience, a passion for thoughtful UI design, collaboration, and learning. I've maintained, developed and launched multiple projects from scratch, carrying the development of its' back-end and front-end codebases. I've been keen on technology and software development since my early teen years and I can say that I have turned my hobby into a profession.
services_info: I love to find simple solutions to complex challenges.
service_web_design_info: Design that strengthens your company’s brand while ensuring ease of use.
service_web_site_development_info: Building complex user interfaces with high level UX for both web and mobile.
service_back_end_development_info: Building Node.js and PHP (web) applications and RESTful API services.
service_website_maintenance_info: Look after, update and improve client's sites.
service_seo_optimisation_info: Along with developing a website from me you get initial optimization.
years_experience_info: I love to connect to people by coding. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful and intuitive designs along with crafting clean & user‑friendly experiences. It is my joy to sit down and write code. I do have the ambition to deliver excellent work, a strong work ethic and the willingness to constantly learn and grow. In my projects I focus on modern and responsive website solutions that are easy to update by the client. That is why I specialise in creating software for clients ranging from individuals and small-businesses all the way to large enterprise corporations. Working with you will always be my privilege.
html5: HTML5 is a core technology markup language of the Internet used for structuring and presenting content for the World Wide Web.
css3: CSS3 is the latest evolution of the Cascading Style Sheets language and aims at extending CSS2.
js: JavaScript is a client scripting language which is used for creating web pages. It was originally developed by Netscape as a means to add dynamic and interactive elements to websites.
ts: TypeScript is an open-source programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft. It is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript, and adds optional static typing to the language. TypeScript is designed for development of large applications and transcompiles to JavaScript.
angular: Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google and by a community of individuals and corporations.
bootstrap: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.
php: PHP is a server-side scripting language designed for web development but also used as a general-purpose programming language.
node: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside of a browser.
python: Python is an interpreted, high-level, general-purpose programming language. It supports multiple programming paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python is often described as a 'batteries included' language due to its comprehensive standard library.
wp: WordPress is the world’s most popular tool for creating websites. WordPress is capable of creating any style of website, from a simple blog to a full-featured business website.
yii2: Yii2 is a high-performance, component-based PHP framework for developing large-scale Web applications rapidly. It enables maximum reusability in Web programming and can significantly accelerate your Web application development process.
mysql: MySQL is the world’s second most widely used open-source relational database management system (RDBMS).
heroku: Heroku is a platform as a service (PaaS) that enables developers to build, run, and operate applications entirely in the cloud.
aws: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform, offering over 175 fully featured services from data centers globally.

portfolio_2_description: elemental.tv platform is an excellent example of modern video streaming technology. The frontend is based on AngularJS, Bootstrap and latest frontend trends. It is responsive to all kind of devices and allows and exceptional User Experience. Elemental TV is a great platform, which allows you to watch different kind of TV programs in real-time and much more.
portfolio_4_description: The Ampslide web based platform is perfect example of innovation and integration of the latest technology trends. Ampslide is used by presenters at conferences to provide real-time, live slide sharing to attendees.
portfolio_4_technologies_text: PHP, Node.js, Python, Bash, Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, Bootstrap

testimonial_1: “Dilyan Lyubomirov is one of the most important people I have had the honor of working with! He is the mastermind behind the biggest grass-root Christmas Gift-giving Platform in Bulgaria that brings back Christmas to underprivileged children from every corner of the country! Thanks to his talents, perseverance, commitment and creativity our team of volunteers is enabled to bring hope, laughter and the childhood back to nearly 10 000 destitute children every year! He single-handedly tackled the task of how best to create such a Platform that gives the chance to thousands of people to be connected to children in need and did it in such a way that today there is almost no one in Bulgaria who hasn’t heard of “Operation: Teddy Bear“. The Christmas miracle is growing in Bulgaria and all that is thanks to Dilyan and his professionalism!“
